metadata.titleEn: China historical and future projected runoff and evapotranspiration dataset (1985-2100)
metadata.titleCn: 中国区域历史及未来预估径流和蒸散数据集（1985-2100）
metadata.description: China historical (1985~2014) and future projected (2015~2100) 0.25° runoff and evapotranspiration dataset, simulated by the variable infiltration capacity (VIC) hydrological model which forcing by six CMIP6 models (CanESM5, FGOALS-g3, GFDL-CM4, IPSL-CM6A-LR, MPI-ESM1-2-HR and MRI-ESM2-0) with statistical downscaling, including three variables: total runoff, surface runoff and evapotranspiration, the time resolution is month or year. The downscaling bias-corrected models perform good in climatic simulation for China, and the VIC model forcing by observed meteorological dataset perform well in the historical runoff simulation. This dataset can be useful for the research about China’s future water resources change under mid (SSP2-4.5) and high (SSP5-8.5) warming scenarios.
metadata.descriptionCn: 中国区域历史（1985~2014）及未来预估（2015~2100）径流和蒸散数据集由六个CMIP6降尺度模式（CanESM5、FGOALS-g3、GFDL-CM4、IPSL-CM6A-LR、MPI-ESM1-2-HR和MRI-ESM2-0），驱动可变下渗容量（VIC）水文模型模拟得到，包括总径流深、地表径流深和蒸散发三个变量，空间分辨率为0.25°，时间分辨率为月或年。经过统计降尺度偏差校正的模式在中国区域气候模拟误差较小，基于实测气象数据驱动的VIC模型在历史期径流模拟效果较好。该数据集可为中国区域未来水资源中（SSP2-4.5）、高（SSP5-8.5）排放情景下的变化研究提供参考。
metadata.instructions:
File name: data stored in .nc format, the file name is “./vars/XX/models/periods/vars_VIC_periods_yyyy_XX.nc”, in which "vars" represent the variables (“totrunoff” is total runoff, “surrunoff” is surface runoff, “evap” is evapotranspiration, units are all “m/day”), "models" represent GCMs, "periods" represent the periods or scenarios, “yyyy" represent the year; such as "./surrunoff/Monthly/CanESM5/ssp245/surrunoff_VIC_ssp245_2015_monthly.nc" represents the .nc file describes the monthly surface runoff in China under SSP2-4.5 scenarios in 2015 from the CanESM5 model. 
Method to read data: all files can use the "ncdump" command to read detail information, and can also read them with MATLAB, Python, cdo or nco tool, besides, these files not only include the corresponding variable, but also has the latitude and longitude variable. If you want to view the file in the form of picture, you can use the ArcGIS to open it.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：数据以nc格式存储，文件名称为“./vars/XX/models/periods/vars_VIC_periods_yyyy_XX.nc”，其中vars代表变量（“totrunoff”为总径流，“surrunoff”为地表径流，“evap”为蒸散发，单位都为“米/天”），XX代表时间分辨率，models代表模式，periods代表时期或情景，yyyy代表年份；比如“./surrunoff/Monthly/CanESM5/ssp245/surrunoff_VIC_ssp245_2015_monthly.nc”就代表这个nc文件描述基于CanESM5模式SSP245情景的2015年中国区域月地表径流深情况。
数据读取方式：该数据集中的所有文件可以用ncdump命令查看，也可以用MATLAB或Python读取，cdo和nco处理，每个文件中除了相应变量，还有经纬度。如果要用图示来显示的话，也可以用ArcGIS打开。

background: The Sixth Assessment Report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC AR6) indicates that the Earth’s mean temperature has increased by 1.1°C relative to the preindustrial revolution period of 1850–1900 and that the rate of increase in global surface temperature in the period of 1970–2020 is greater than that in any 50-year period prior to 2000. Large amounts of greenhouse gases emitted by human activities are a primary cause of global warming (IPCC, 2021); furthermore, elevated CO2 concentrations cause plant stomata to close, leading to reduced transpiration and thus affecting river flows (Gedney et al., 2006). Studies have shown (Skliris et al., 2016) that a 1°C increase will affect the hydrological cycle, amplifying the ambient humidity at a rate of 3–4%. Global climate models (GCMs) can describe in detail the changes in atmospheric motion, heat exchange, and sea-land-air-ice interactions over time (Gleick, 1989) and are effective tools for studying the effects of historical, present, and future atmospheric changes on surface physical processes (Gonzalez et al., 2010; Sun et al., 2013; Guo et al., 2015). Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 (CMIP6) has improved the simulation of temperature and precipitation in the China region compared with Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 5 (CMIP5) (Jiang et al., 2020); specifically, the dry bias is significantly reduced in southern China (Zhu et al., 2020). CMIP6 is based on the Representative Concentration Pathways (RCPs) of CMIP5 (van Vuuren et al., 2011) and proposes the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways (SSPs) (Riahi et al., 2017), which can reflect newer and more diverse greenhouse gas concentration changes under social development (O’Neill et al., 2016). However, the spatial resolution of GCMs is coarse, and downscaling bias correction is usually required for finer-resolution basin-scale hydrological model simulations, where statistical downscaling is more widely used than dynamical downscaling due to simpler calculations and more reliable results (Ahmed et al., 2013).

The downscaling methods of GCMs mainly include dynamic downscaling and statistical downscaling. Although the former has clear physical meaning, it is more computationally intensive, while the latter is relatively easy to calculate and can correct the statistical bias of the GCMs with better results, so it is widely used in research regarding the impact of climate change at the regional scale (Sun et al., 2013; Zhang et al., 2016; Xu and Wang, 2019). Teutschbein and Seibert (2012) used different statistical methods to correct the precipitation and temperature of regional climate models for five mesoscale basins in Switzerland and found that the method based on the cumulative distribution function (CDF) was the most effective. Based on this result, Li et al. (2010) proposed the equidistant cumulative distribution function method (EDCDFm), which corrects the CDF of the GCM variables to be consistent with the measured data in the historical period, and the GCM output of the future scenario is corrected according to the difference between the CDF of the GCMs historical period and the measured data. The study shows that EDCDFm can effectively capture the extreme values of climate elements and improve the accuracy of the GCMs and model simulation after downscaling.

Generally, a value of NSE closer to 1 indicates that the simulation results are better, and an NSE less than 0 indicates that the simulation results are unreliable. The NSE of monthly streamflow between simulations and observations is at or above 0.60 at each station (Table 2), suggesting that the VIC model is more applicable to hydrological simulations in China.
research objective: In this paper, we use the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) to perform downscaling and bias correction in daily precipitation, daily maximum temperature, and daily minimum temperature for six CMIP6 models based on the historical gridded data from the high-resolution China Meteorological Forcing Dataset (CMFD). We use the bias-corrected precipitation, temperature, and daily mean wind speed to drive the variable infiltration capacity (VIC) hydrological model, and study the changes in multiyear average annual precipitation, annual evapotranspiration and total annual runoff depth relative to the historical baseline period (1985–2014) for the Chinese mainland, basins and grid scales in the 21st century future under the SSP2-4.5 and SSP5-8.5 scenarios.

This study, based on the VIC hydrological model, uses six CMIP6 GCMs (CanESM5, FGOALS-g3, GFDL-CM4, IPSL-CM6A-LR, MPI-ESM1-2-HR, and MRI-ESM2-0) data with EDCDFm statistical downscaling bias-corrected and two future scenarios, SSP2-4.5 and SSP5-8.5, to project future changes in the terrestrial surface water cycle in the Chinese mainland and major basins in the 21st century, using CMFD gridded data as a historical reference.
methods: In this paper, we use the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) to perform downscaling and bias correction in daily precipitation, daily maximum temperature, and daily minimum temperature for six CMIP6 models based on the historical gridded data from the high-resolution China Meteorological Forcing Dataset (CMFD). We use the bias-corrected precipitation, temperature, and daily mean wind speed to drive the variable infiltration capacity (VIC) hydrological model, and study the changes in multiyear average annual precipitation, annual evapotranspiration and total annual runoff depth relative to the historical baseline period (1985–2014) for the Chinese mainland, basins and grid scales in the 21st century future under the SSP2-4.5 and SSP5-8.5 scenarios.

Therefore, this study used the EDCDFm method, CMFD and the six GCMs, which were first downscaled (DS) to 0.25° spatial resolution by bilinear interpolation; the daily Tmax, daily Tmax, and daily P of each GCM grid were then biased corrected (BC) based on the CDF of the corresponding grid series. The CDF was calculated by referring to the paper (Watterson, 2008; Li et al., 2010), where the probability density function (PDF) of temperature was estimated using a four-parameter beta function, the PDF of precipitation was estimated using a mixed gamma distribution function, and the parameters were estimated using the 1979–2014 series for the historical period and the 2015–2100 series for the future period. Three indicators were used to evaluate the downscaling bias-corrected GCMs data accuracy in monthly values: mean absolute error (MAE), root mean squared error (RMSE), and Pearson correlation coefficient (PCC).
dataset: The CMFD dataset spans 1979–2018 and includes seven elements: near-surface air temperature, surface pressure, specific humidity, wind speed, downward shortwave radiation, downward longwave radiation and precipitation rate, with a temporal resolution of 3 h and a spatial resolution of 0.1°. The daily precipitation rate, daily near-surface maximum temperature, daily near-surface minimum temperature, and daily near-surface wind speed of CMFD in 1979–2014 were interpolated to 0.25° by the bilinear interpolation method and as the measured information for the VIC model atmospheric drive and GCM bias correction.

Measured streamflow was used as references to evaluate the monthly simulation performance of the VIC and CaMa-Flood model; these measurements represented 15 hydrological stations in ten major river basins of China based on data from the Ministry of Water Resources and the Yingluoxia hydrological station (Figure 1 and Table 2) in the Hei Basin based on data from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center (Liu et al., 2016a, 2016b; Xie, 2016).
findings: The study shows that the VIC model accurately simulates runoff in major Chinese basins; the model data accuracy improves substantially after downscaling bias correction; and the future multimodel-mean multiyear average annual precipitation, annual evapotranspiration, and total annual runoff depth for the Chinese mainland and each basin increase relative to the historical period in near future (2020–2049) and far future (2070–2099) under the SSP2-4.5 and SSP5-8.5 scenarios.

In summary, the hydrological station monthly streamflow based on CMFD and VIC model simulations had small errors and strong correlations with the observation streamflow in all basins, and the VIC model and CMFD driver used in this study performed well in the Chinese mainland (Table 2).

The monthly streamflow simulated by the CMFD-driven VIC model and CaMa-Flood model has NSEs of 0.6 in the YR and Huai basins and NSEs of 0.7–0.9 in other study basins, indicating that the VIC model hydrological simulation is applicable in the Chinese mainland. The hydrological projections of the single GCM data at the basin scale have large uncertainties. The multi-GCM arithmetic ensemble mean reduces the uncertainty of GCM projections. Under the SSP2-4.5 and SSP5-8.5 scenarios, the future water resources in the Chinese mainland and each basin are likely to increase, and the decrease in annual runoff is likely to occur mainly in the northwest and southwest regions, which can provide a strong scientific reference for future water resource management and risk analysis in China under climate change.
backgroundCn: 气候变化政府间专门委员会第六次评估报告（IPCC AR6）指出，自工业革命前的1850-1900年期间以来，地球的平均温度已上升1.1°C，并且1970-2020年期间全球表面温度的上升速率超过了2000年之前的任何50年期间。人类活动排放的大量温室气体是全球变暖的主要原因（IPCC，2021）；此外，二氧化碳浓度的升高导致植物气孔关闭，从而减少蒸腾作用，影响河流流量（Gedney等，2006）。研究表明（Skliris等，2016），1°C的升高将影响水文循环，使环境湿度以3-4%的速率增强。全球气候模型（GCMs）能够详细描述大气运动、热交换以及海洋、陆地、空气和冰层之间的相互作用随时间的变化（Gleick，1989），并且是研究历史、当前和未来大气变化对地表物理过程影响的有效工具（Gonzalez等，2010；Sun等，2013；Guo等，2015）。耦合模型比较项目第六阶段（CMIP6）在模拟中国地区的温度和降水方面相比于耦合模型比较项目第五阶段（CMIP5）有所改善（Jiang等，2020）；具体而言，南方中国的干旱偏差显著减少（Zhu等，2020）。CMIP6基于CMIP5的代表性浓度路径（RCPs）（van Vuuren等，2011），并提出了共享社会经济路径（SSPs）（Riahi等，2017），可以反映在社会发展下温室气体浓度变化的新颖和多样化。然而，GCM的空间分辨率较粗，通常需要进行下尺度偏差修正，以便进行更细分的流域尺度水文模型模拟，其中统计下尺度方法由于计算更简单和结果更可靠而比动力下尺度方法更为广泛使用（Ahmed等，2013）。

GCMs的降尺度方法主要包括动态降尺度和统计降尺度。尽管前者具有明确的物理意义，但计算量较大，而后者相对容易计算，并且能够更好地修正GCM的统计偏差，因此在气候变化影响的区域研究中被广泛使用（Sun et al., 2013; Zhang et al., 2016; Xu and Wang, 2019）。Teutschbein和Seibert（2012）使用不同的统计方法对瑞士五个中尺度流域的区域气候模型的降水和温度进行修正，发现基于累积分布函数（CDF）的方法最为有效。基于这一结果，Li等（2010）提出了等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm），该方法修正GCM变量的CDF，使其与历史时期的观测数据一致，并根据GCM历史时期的CDF与观测数据之间的差异修正未来情景的GCM输出。研究表明，EDCDFm能够有效捕捉气候要素的极端值，提高GCM的准确性和模型模拟的效果。
一般来说，NSE值越接近1，表明模拟结果越好；而NSE值小于0则表明模拟结果不可靠。各站点的月流量模拟与观测的NSE值均在0.60或以上（见表2），这表明VIC模型在中国的水文模拟中更具适用性。
research objectiveCn: 在本文中，我们使用等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm）对六个CMIP6模型的日降水量、日最高气温和日最低气温进行下采样和偏差修正，基于高分辨率的中国气象强迫数据集（CMFD）历史网格数据。我们使用偏差修正后的降水量、气温和日均风速来驱动可变渗透能力（VIC）水文模型，并研究在21世纪未来SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5情景下，相对于历史基线时期（1985-2014年），中国大陆、流域和网格尺度的多年平均年降水量、年蒸发蒸散量和年总径流深度的变化。
本研究基于VIC水文模型，使用六个CMIP6气候模型（CanESM5、FGOALS-g3、GFDL-CM4、IPSL-CM6A-LR、MPI-ESM1-2-HR和MRI-ESM2-0）数据，结合EDCDFm统计降尺度偏差校正和两个未来情景（SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5），对21世纪中国大陆及主要流域的陆地水循环未来变化进行预测，使用CMFD网格数据作为历史参考。
methodsCn: 在本文中，我们使用等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm）对六个CMIP6模型的日降水量、日最高气温和日最低气温进行降尺度和偏差修正，基于高分辨率的中国气象强迫数据集（CMFD）的历史网格数据。我们使用偏差修正后的降水量、气温和日均风速来驱动可变渗透能力（VIC）水文模型，并研究在21世纪未来SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5情景下，相对于历史基线时期（1985-2014年），中国大陆、流域和网格尺度的多年平均年降水量、年蒸发蒸散和年总径流深度的变化。

因此，本研究采用了EDCDFm方法、CMFD和六个GCM，首先通过双线性插值将其降尺度（DS）到0.25°的空间分辨率；然后对每个GCM网格的日最高气温（Tmax）、日最低气温（Tmin）和日降水量（P）进行了基于相应网格序列的CDF的偏差修正（BC）。CDF的计算参考了文献（Watterson, 2008; Li et al., 2010），其中温度的概率密度函数（PDF）使用四参数贝塔函数估计，降水量的PDF使用混合伽马分布函数估计，参数是基于1979-2014年的历史序列和2015-2100年的未来序列进行估计的。使用三个指标来评估降尺度偏差修正后的GCM数据在月值上的准确性：平均绝对误差（MAE）、均方根误差（RMSE）和皮尔逊相关系数（PCC）。
datasetCn: CMFD 数据集涵盖了 1979 年至 2018 年的时间段，包括七个要素：近地面空气温度、地面气压、比湿、风速、下行短波辐射、下行长波辐射和降水率，时间分辨率为 3 小时，空间分辨率为 0.1°。CMFD 在 1979 年至 2014 年的日降水率、日近地面最高温度、日近地面最低温度和日近地面风速通过双线性插值法插值到 0.25°，作为 VIC 模型的气象驱动和 GCM 偏差修正的测量信息。
测得的河流流量被用作参考，以评估VIC和CaMa-Flood模型的月度模拟性能；这些测量代表了中国十个主要河流流域中的15个水文站，数据来源于水利部和国家西藏高原数据中心的英洛峡水文站（图1和表2）（Liu et al., 2016a, 2016b; Xie, 2016）。
findingsCn: 研究表明，VIC模型准确模拟了中国主要流域的径流；经过降尺度偏差修正后，模型数据的准确性显著提高；在近未来（2020-2049年）和远未来（2070-2099年）下，基于SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5情景，中国大陆及各流域的多模型平均多年平均年降水量、年蒸散发量和年总径流深度相较于历史时期均有所增加。
根据CMFD和VIC模型模拟的水文站月流量在所有流域与观测流量之间存在较小的误差和较强的相关性，VIC模型和本研究中使用的CMFD驱动在中国大陆表现良好（表2）。

由CMFD驱动的VIC模型和CaMa-Flood模型模拟的月流量在YR和淮河流域的NSE为0.6，而在其他研究流域的NSE为0.7-0.9，表明VIC模型的水文模拟在中国大陆是适用的。单一GCM数据在流域尺度上的水文预测存在较大不确定性。多GCM算术集合均值减少了GCM预测的不确定性。在SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5情景下，中国大陆及各流域的未来水资源可能会增加，而年径流的减少主要可能发生在西北和西南地区，这为未来在气候变化下中国的水资源管理和风险分析提供了有力的科学参考。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the application of the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) effectively improve the accuracy of downscaled climate data for hydrological simulations?
Verification.QuestionCn: 等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm）的应用是否有效提高了水文模拟中下游气候数据的准确性？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the variable infiltration capacity (VIC) hydrological model considered suitable for simulating streamflow in the Chinese mainland?
Verification.QuestionCn: 变渗透能力（VIC）水文模型是否被认为适合在中国大陆模拟径流？

Verification.QuestionEn: Can the CMFD dataset be used as a historical reference for bias correction in climate model simulations?
Verification.QuestionCn: CMFD数据集可以作为气候模型模拟中偏差修正的历史参考吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which spatial resolution is typically used for downscaling GCM data for regional hydrological simulations, 0.1° or 0.25°?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 通常用于区域水文模拟的GCM数据下采样的空间分辨率是0.1°还是0.25°？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What is the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) used for in data collection?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 等距累积分布函数法（EDCDFm）在数据收集中的用途是什么？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where can one find the CMFD dataset, and what are its characteristics?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: CMFD数据集可以在哪里找到，它的特点是什么？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: When are statistical downscaling methods preferred over dynamic downscaling in research?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在研究中，何时更倾向于使用统计降尺度方法而不是动态降尺度方法？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to ensure the accuracy of hydrological simulations in the context of climate change projections for China?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，以确保在气候变化预测背景下中国水文模拟的准确性？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to ensure accuracy in hydrological simulations is the use of the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) for downscaling and bias correction of daily precipitation, maximum temperature, and minimum temperature data from six CMIP6 models, based on historical gridded data from the high-resolution China Meteorological Forcing Dataset (CMFD).
Example.AnswerCn: 确保水文模拟准确性的一种数据收集方法是使用等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm）对来自六个CMIP6模型的日降水量、最高气温和最低气温数据进行降尺度和偏差修正，基于高分辨率中国气象强迫数据集（CMFD）的历史网格数据。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge encountered when using global climate model outputs for basin-scale hydrological simulations?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用全球气候模型输出进行流域尺度水文模拟时遇到的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge encountered is the coarse spatial resolution of global climate models (GCMs), which necessitates downscaling bias correction for finer-resolution basin-scale hydrological model simulations. This is typically addressed using statistical downscaling methods, which are preferred over dynamic downscaling due to simpler calculations and more reliable results.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个遇到的挑战是全球气候模型（GCMs）的空间分辨率较粗，这需要进行降尺度偏差修正，以便进行更细分的流域尺度水文模型模拟。通常使用统计降尺度方法来解决这个问题，因为与动态降尺度相比，统计降尺度方法计算更简单且结果更可靠。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset that has been used to drive hydrological models for simulating streamflow in major Chinese river basins?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于驱动水文模型以模拟中国主要河流流域的流量的示例数据集？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset is the CMFD dataset, which spans from 1979 to 2018, including elements like near-surface air temperature, pressure, specific humidity, wind speed, and precipitation rate, with a temporal resolution of 3 hours and a spatial resolution of 0.1°. This dataset is used to drive the Variable Infiltration Capacity (VIC) hydrological model and perform GCM bias correction.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子是CMFD数据集，涵盖了1979年至2018年，包括近地面空气温度、气压、比湿、风速和降水率等元素，时间分辨率为3小时，空间分辨率为0.1°。该数据集用于驱动可变渗透能力（VIC）水文模型并进行GCM偏差校正。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the data collection methods used to obtain historical and future runoff and evapotranspiration data in the field of hydrology?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在水文学领域，用于获取历史和未来径流及蒸散发数据的数据收集方法包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: CanESM5, FGOALS-g3, GFDL-CM4, IPSL-CM6A-LR, MPI-ESM1-2-HR, MRI-ESM2-0, Variable Infiltration Capacity hydrological model, Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method, China Meteorological Forcing Dataset
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: CanESM5, FGOALS-g3, GFDL-CM4, IPSL-CM6A-LR, MPI-ESM1-2-HR, MRI-ESM2-0, 变量入渗容量水文模型, 等距累积分布函数方法, 中国气象强制数据集

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the CMFD dataset used in hydrological modeling?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: CMFD数据集在水文建模中的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: spans from 1979 to 2018, near-surface air temperature, surface pressure, specific humidity, wind speed, downward shortwave radiation, downward longwave radiation, precipitation rate, temporal resolution of 3 hours, spatial resolution of 0.1°, interpolated to 0.25° resolution
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 1979年至2018年，近地表空气温度、地表气压、比湿、风速、向下短波辐射、向下长波辐射、降水率，时间分辨率为3小时，空间分辨率为0.1°，插值至0.25°分辨率。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the features of statistical downscaling methods used for climate model data in hydrological studies?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 气候模型数据在水文研究中使用的统计降尺度方法的特点有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: easy to calculate, more reliable than dynamic downscaling, bias correction of daily precipitation, bias correction of daily maximum temperature, bias correction of daily minimum temperature, corrections made according to the cumulative distribution function of historical grid series data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 易于计算，比动态降尺度更可靠，日降水量的偏差校正，日最高气温的偏差校正，日最低气温的偏差校正，根据历史网格序列数据的累积分布函数进行校正。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many CMIP6 models were utilized to simulate the future terrestrial surface water cycle in the Chinese mainland?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 有多少个CMIP6模型被用于模拟中国大陆未来的陆地水循环？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the temporal resolution of the CMFD dataset used for atmospheric drive and bias correction?
Quantification.QuestionCn: CMFD数据集用于大气驱动和偏差校正的时间分辨率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) used for in hydrological modeling?
Definition.QuestionCn: 等距累积分布函数法（EDCDFm）在水文建模中用于什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) is used for downscaling and bias correction in daily precipitation, daily maximum temperature, and daily minimum temperature for global climate models. It corrects the CDF of these variables to be consistent with measured data during the historical period, enhancing the accuracy of future scenario projections.
Definition.AnswerCn: 等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm）用于全球气候模型的日降水量、日最高气温和日最低气温的降尺度和偏差修正。它通过将这些变量的累积分布函数（CDF）修正为与历史时期的观测数据一致，从而提高未来情景预测的准确性。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does statistical downscaling involve in the context of global climate model simulations?
Definition.QuestionCn: 统计下采样在全球气候模型模拟的背景下涉及什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Statistical downscaling involves correcting the statistical bias of global climate models (GCMs) using historical data to achieve finer-resolution simulations. This method is computationally less intensive than dynamic downscaling and provides more reliable results for regional climate change impact studies.
Definition.AnswerCn: 统计降尺度涉及使用历史数据修正全球气候模型（GCMs）的统计偏差，以实现更高分辨率的模拟。该方法在计算上比动态降尺度更为简单，并为区域气候变化影响研究提供了更可靠的结果。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the downscaling methods of Global Climate Models (GCMs) differ in terms of computational intensity and applicability for regional climate impact studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 全球气候模型（GCMs）的下采样方法在计算强度和区域气候影响研究的适用性方面有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The downscaling methods of GCMs mainly include dynamic downscaling and statistical downscaling. Dynamic downscaling has a clear physical meaning but is more computationally intensive, whereas statistical downscaling is easier to calculate and can correct the statistical bias of the GCMs with better results, making it more widely used in regional climate impact research.
Comparison.AnswerCn: GCMs的降尺度方法主要包括动态降尺度和统计降尺度。动态降尺度具有明确的物理意义，但计算量较大；而统计降尺度计算更简单，可以更好地修正GCMs的统计偏差，因此在区域气候影响研究中更为广泛使用。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in spatial resolution and data sources between the CMFD dataset and the downscaled GCMs used in hydrological simulations?
Comparison.QuestionCn: CMFD数据集与用于水文模拟的下尺度GCMs之间在空间分辨率和数据来源方面有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The CMFD dataset has a spatial resolution of 0.1°, while the downscaled GCMs used in hydrological simulations are interpolated to a spatial resolution of 0.25°. The CMFD dataset spans 1979–2018 and includes seven elements, serving as historical gridded data for bias correction, whereas the GCMs are used for projecting future changes.
Comparison.AnswerCn: CMFD 数据集的空间分辨率为 0.1°，而用于水文模拟的降尺度 GCMs 被插值到 0.25° 的空间分辨率。CMFD 数据集的时间跨度为 1979–2018 年，包括七个要素，作为偏差修正的历史网格数据，而 GCMs 则用于预测未来变化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) influence the interpretation of historical precipitation and temperature data when applied to downscale global climate models (GCMs)?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm）在对全球气候模型（GCMs）进行降尺度时，可能会影响对历史降水和温度数据的解读。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The EDCDFm method is used to correct the statistical bias of GCM variables by aligning their cumulative distribution functions with observed data during the historical period. This approach allows for a more accurate representation of extreme climate elements and enhances the reliability of simulations, providing a more precise understanding of historical climate patterns.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: EDCDFm 方法用于通过将全球气候模型（GCM）变量的累积分布函数与历史时期的观测数据对齐，从而纠正统计偏差。这种方法能够更准确地表示极端气候元素，并增强模拟的可靠性，从而提供对历史气候模式的更精确理解。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the need for downscaling and bias correction in hydrological modeling using GCM data in the context of Chinese regional climate studies?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在中国区域气候研究中，影响使用全球气候模型（GCM）数据进行水文建模时需要进行降尺度和偏差修正的因素包括：
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The coarse spatial resolution of GCMs necessitates downscaling and bias correction for finer-resolution basin-scale hydrological model simulations. Statistical downscaling is often preferred due to its simpler calculations and ability to correct the statistical bias of the GCMs effectively. This approach helps to improve the accuracy of climate simulations at the regional scale, where climate models like CMIP6 have shown reduced simulation errors in the China region.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: GCMs的粗糙空间分辨率需要进行降尺度和偏差修正，以便进行更细分辨率的流域尺度水文模型模拟。由于统计降尺度计算更简单，并且能够有效地纠正GCM的统计偏差，因此通常更受青睐。这种方法有助于提高区域尺度气候模拟的准确性，其中像CMIP6这样的气候模型在中国地区显示出减少的模拟误差。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) favored for correcting precipitation and temperature data in regional climate models?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm）在区域气候模型中被偏爱用于修正降水和温度数据？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The EDCDFm is favored because it effectively captures the extreme values of climate elements and improves the accuracy of GCMs after downscaling. This method adjusts the cumulative distribution function (CDF) of GCM variables to align with historical measured data, allowing for improved bias correction of future scenario outputs. The method is particularly effective in producing reliable downscaled outputs for regional applications.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: EDCDFm方法受到青睐，因为它有效捕捉气候元素的极端值，并在下采样后提高了全球气候模型（GCM）的准确性。该方法调整GCM变量的累积分布函数（CDF），使其与历史测量数据对齐，从而改善未来情景输出的偏差校正。该方法在为区域应用生成可靠的下采样输出方面特别有效。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the multi-GCM ensemble approach to be beneficial in reducing uncertainties in hydrological projections for future climate scenarios?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 多气候模式集合体方法在减少未来气候情景下水文预测的不确定性方面的好处是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Hydrological projections using single GCM data at the basin scale can have large uncertainties. By using the multi-GCM arithmetic ensemble mean, these uncertainties are reduced. This approach aggregates multiple model outputs, which helps to provide a more reliable estimate of future water resources and climate impacts, thus offering a stronger scientific basis for future water resource management and risk analysis under climate change scenarios.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用单一气候模型（GCM）数据进行流域尺度的水文预测可能存在较大的不确定性。通过使用多气候模型算术集合均值，这些不确定性得以减少。这种方法聚合了多个模型的输出，有助于提供更可靠的未来水资源和气候影响估计，从而为气候变化情景下未来水资源管理和风险分析提供更强的科学依据。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of using statistical downscaling methods on the accuracy of hydrological simulations in regional climate studies?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在区域气候研究中使用统计降尺度方法对水文模拟准确性的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Statistical downscaling methods, such as the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm), are used to correct the statistical bias of Global Climate Models (GCMs). These methods improve the accuracy of hydrological simulations by providing finer-resolution data that better reflects local conditions. As a result, the accuracy of model simulations, including variables like precipitation, temperature, and runoff, is enhanced, leading to more reliable projections of hydrological changes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 统计降尺度方法，如等距累积分布函数法（EDCDFm），用于修正全球气候模型（GCMs）的统计偏差。这些方法通过提供更细分的分辨率数据，更好地反映局部条件，从而提高水文模拟的准确性。因此，模型模拟的准确性，包括降水、温度和径流等变量，得到了增强，从而导致对水文变化的更可靠预测。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How do different emission scenarios like SSP2-4.5 and SSP5-8.5 affect the projections of future water resources in China?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 不同的排放情景，如SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5，如何影响中国未来水资源的预测？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of different emission scenarios such as SSP2-4.5 and SSP5-8.5 influences the projections of future water resources by impacting the expected changes in climate variables like precipitation and temperature. Under these scenarios, the study projects an increase in multiyear average annual precipitation, annual evapotranspiration, and total annual runoff depth for the Chinese mainland and each basin. These changes are likely to enhance water resource availability in the future, although variations may occur regionally, with potential decreases in annual runoff in the northwest and southwest regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 不同的排放情景，如SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5，会影响未来水资源的预测，因为它们会影响气候变量（如降水和温度）的预期变化。在这些情景下，研究预测中国大陆及各流域的多年平均年降水量、年蒸发蒸散量和年总径流深度将增加。这些变化可能会增强未来水资源的可用性，尽管在区域上可能会出现差异，西北和西南地区的年径流可能会减少。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What is the impact of using a high-resolution gridded dataset, like the CMFD, on the evaluation of hydrological model performance?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用高分辨率网格数据集，如CMFD，对水文模型性能评估的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing a high-resolution gridded dataset like the China Meteorological Forcing Dataset (CMFD) significantly impacts the evaluation of hydrological model performance by providing detailed baseline data against which model outputs can be compared. The CMFD offers high temporal and spatial resolution, which helps in accurately driving hydrological models and correcting biases in GCM outputs. Consequently, the model simulation results, such as monthly streamflow, show strong correlations with observed data, enhancing confidence in the model's applicability for future projections in the region.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用高分辨率的网格数据集，如中国气象强迫数据集（CMFD），对水文模型性能的评估产生了显著影响，因为它提供了详细的基线数据，可以用来与模型输出进行比较。CMFD提供了高时间和空间分辨率，这有助于准确驱动水文模型并修正GCM输出中的偏差。因此，模型模拟结果，如月流量，与观测数据之间表现出强相关性，增强了对模型在该地区未来预测适用性的信心。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What steps are involved in applying the Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) for downscaling and bias correction of climate model data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn:
应用等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm）进行气候模型数据的下采样和偏差修正涉及以下步骤：

1. **数据准备**：收集气候模型数据和观测数据，确保数据的时间范围和空间分辨率一致。

2. **计算分布函数**：为观测数据和气候模型数据计算累积分布函数（CDF）。

3. **确定等距点**：在观测数据的CDF上确定等距点，这些点将用于映射气候模型数据。

4. **映射模型数据**：使用气候模型数据的CDF，将其值映射到观测数据的CDF上，生成修正后的数据。

5. **生成修正后的数据**：根据映射结果生成新的气候模型数据，这些数据在统计特性上更接近观测数据。

6. **验证和评估**：对修正后的数据进行验证，评估其与观测数据的一致性和准确性。

7. **应用和分析**：将修正后的数据用于进一步的气候分析和应用。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The application of the EDCDFm involves first downscaling the GCM data to a higher spatial resolution using bilinear interpolation. Subsequently, the CDF of the GCM variables is corrected to match the measured data from the historical period. The GCM output for future scenarios is then corrected based on the differences between the historical CDF of the GCMs and the measured data. This procedure includes estimating the probability density function (PDF) of temperature using a four-parameter beta function and precipitation using a mixed gamma distribution function.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: EDCDFm的应用首先涉及使用双线性插值将GCM数据降尺度到更高的空间分辨率。随后，GCM变量的累积分布函数（CDF）被校正，以匹配历史时期的测量数据。未来情景的GCM输出随后根据GCM的历史CDF与测量数据之间的差异进行校正。该过程包括使用四参数贝塔函数估计温度的概率密度函数（PDF），以及使用混合伽马分布函数估计降水的概率密度函数。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are taken to ensure the accuracy of hydrological simulations in major Chinese basins using downscaled climate model outputs?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保使用下调气候模型输出在中国主要流域进行水文模拟的准确性，采取了哪些程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure accuracy, the procedural steps include using statistical downscaling methods like EDCDFm to correct biases in GCM outputs, and then using these corrected outputs to drive the VIC hydrological model. The accuracy of the model is evaluated using indicators such as the Nash-Sutcliffe efficiency (NSE), mean absolute error (MAE), root mean squared error (RMSE), and Pearson correlation coefficient (PCC) by comparing simulated streamflow against observed data from hydrological stations across major river basins.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保准确性，程序步骤包括使用统计降尺度方法如EDCDFm来修正GCM输出中的偏差，然后使用这些修正后的输出驱动VIC水文模型。通过将模拟的流量与主要河流流域的水文站观测数据进行比较，使用纳什-沙普利效率（NSE）、平均绝对误差（MAE）、均方根误差（RMSE）和皮尔逊相关系数（PCC）等指标来评估模型的准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What might be the anticipated challenges in using statistical downscaling methods for correcting GCM data biases in regional climate studies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在区域气候研究中，使用统计下调方法来修正全球气候模型（GCM）数据偏差可能面临的挑战包括：
Expectation.AnswerEn: The anticipated challenges could include ensuring the accuracy of the bias-correction methods like EDCDFm in capturing extreme climate events, as well as dealing with the computational intensity and reliability of the chosen statistical techniques compared to dynamic methods.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 预期的挑战可能包括确保像EDCDFm这样的偏差修正方法在捕捉极端气候事件方面的准确性，以及处理所选统计技术的计算强度和可靠性，相较于动态方法。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be an expectation of increased accuracy in hydrological simulations when using a multi-GCM ensemble mean approach?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在使用多气候模式集合均值方法时，可能会期望水文模拟的准确性提高？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The expectation of increased accuracy arises because the multi-GCM ensemble mean approach can reduce the uncertainties inherent in individual GCM projections, providing a more reliable average that is likely to better represent future scenarios.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于多气候模式（GCM）集合均值方法可以减少单个GCM预测中固有的不确定性，因此期望提高准确性，提供一个更可靠的平均值，更有可能更好地代表未来情景。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected improvements in the accuracy of hydrological model simulations after applying statistical downscaling bias correction to GCM data?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在对GCM数据应用统计下调偏差校正后，水文模型模拟的准确性预期会有所提高。
Expectation.AnswerEn: The expected improvements include a substantial increase in model data accuracy, as downscaling bias correction can adjust the GCM data to better match historical observations, thus enhancing the simulation of runoff and other hydrological variables.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 预期的改进包括模型数据准确性的显著提高，因为降尺度偏差校正可以调整全球气候模型（GCM）数据，使其更好地与历史观测数据匹配，从而增强径流和其他水文变量的模拟。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do researchers perceive the role of statistical downscaling in addressing spatial resolution limitations of Global Climate Models (GCMs) in hydrological studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 研究人员如何看待统计降尺度在解决全球气候模型（GCMs）在水文研究中空间分辨率限制的作用？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Researchers consider statistical downscaling as a valuable approach to address the coarse spatial resolution of Global Climate Models (GCMs). It is preferred over dynamic downscaling due to simpler calculations and more reliable results. Statistical downscaling corrects the bias of GCMs, making it widely used for studying the impact of climate change on regional scales, including hydrological simulations in China.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 研究人员认为统计降尺度是一种有价值的方法，可以解决全球气候模型（GCMs）空间分辨率粗糙的问题。由于计算更简单且结果更可靠，它比动态降尺度更受欢迎。统计降尺度修正了GCMs的偏差，因此在研究气候变化对区域尺度的影响时被广泛使用，包括中国的水文模拟。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the spatial and temporal resolution of datasets can affect the accuracy of hydrological simulations in regional studies.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据集的空间和时间分辨率如何影响区域研究中水文模拟的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The spatial resolution of 0.25° and temporal resolution of monthly or yearly data are crucial in hydrological simulations as they determine the granularity and precision of the model outputs. Finer resolutions allow for more detailed simulations that better capture local variations in hydrology, leading to improved accuracy in modeling runoff and evapotranspiration patterns.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 空间分辨率为0.25°和时间分辨率为每月或每年的数据在水文模拟中至关重要，因为它们决定了模型输出的细致程度和精确度。更细的分辨率允许进行更详细的模拟，更好地捕捉水文的局部变化，从而提高径流和蒸散发模式建模的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the significance of using multiple climate models and scenarios in projecting future water resource changes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在预测未来水资源变化时使用多个气候模型和情景的重要性感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Using multiple climate models and scenarios, like the six CMIP6 models and SSP2-4.5 and SSP5-8.5 scenarios, helps to capture a range of possible future conditions and reduces uncertainty in projections. This approach provides a more comprehensive understanding of potential changes in water resources and helps in assessing the implications of different greenhouse gas emission pathways.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 使用多个气候模型和情景，如六个CMIP6模型以及SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5情景，有助于捕捉未来可能条件的范围，并减少预测中的不确定性。这种方法提供了对水资源潜在变化的更全面理解，并有助于评估不同温室气体排放路径的影响。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the methods used for downscaling and bias correction in climate model simulations and evaluate their applicability to hydrological modeling in regional studies.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 总结气候模型模拟中用于降尺度和偏差修正的方法，并评估它们在区域研究中的水文建模适用性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The Equidistant Cumulative Distribution Function method (EDCDFm) is used for downscaling and bias correction in daily precipitation, daily maximum temperature, and daily minimum temperature for six CMIP6 models, based on historical gridded data from the high-resolution China Meteorological Forcing Dataset (CMFD). This method corrects the cumulative distribution function of GCM variables to align with measured data from the historical period and then applies this correction to future scenarios. This approach is widely used due to its computational efficiency and ability to correct statistical biases, making it suitable for regional hydrological modeling.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 等距累积分布函数方法（EDCDFm）用于对六个CMIP6模型的日降水量、日最高气温和日最低气温进行下尺度化和偏差修正，基于高分辨率的中国气象强迫数据集（CMFD）历史网格数据。该方法通过校正GCM变量的累积分布函数，使其与历史时期的观测数据对齐，然后将此校正应用于未来情景。由于其计算效率高和能够修正统计偏差，这种方法在区域水文建模中被广泛使用。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify potential datasets that could supplement existing hydrological models to improve the accuracy of future water resource projections under different climate scenarios.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别潜在的数据集，这些数据集可以补充现有的水文模型，以提高在不同气候情景下未来水资源预测的准确性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets that could enhance hydrological model accuracy include high-resolution historical climate data like the China Meteorological Forcing Dataset (CMFD), which provides detailed information on air temperature, pressure, humidity, wind speed, and radiation, among others. Additionally, measured streamflow data from major hydrological stations in China, as mentioned in the study, could be used to validate and refine model simulations. Incorporating such datasets can improve bias correction and the accuracy of projections under scenarios like SSP2-4.5 and SSP5-8.5.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集可以增强水文模型的准确性，包括高分辨率的历史气候数据，如中国气象强迫数据集（CMFD），该数据集提供了关于气温、气压、湿度、风速和辐射等详细信息。此外，来自中国主要水文站的实测径流数据，如研究中提到的，可以用于验证和改进模型模拟。纳入这些数据集可以改善偏差校正和在SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5等情景下的预测准确性。
